name: Vigor Hero
description:
–  Description  –

As a legendary dwarf blacksmith, you'll beat the rhythm on your blazing anvil to craft weapons that will satisfy weary travelers coming to your shop.

«Everything can die, with the right weapon» - Vigor

–  Controls  –

Press the arrows in rythym to progress in the game, it's that easy !      ←↑→ 

–  Credits  –
  • Hermine, graphist
  • Tovi, Sound designer
  • Romimap, Dev

We used the Alagard font from Hewett Tsoi, and the Gothic Pixel font from SparklyDest
